description: Simple and tasty, this roast pumpkin can be served straight from the oven or enjoyed at room temperature.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Roast,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Pumpkin,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Christmas,Soy free,Vegetarian,Easter,Peanut free
name: Roast Butternut Pumpkin Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2kg whole butternut pumpkin, halved lengthways, deseeded

recipeInstructions.text: Score surface of pumpkin in a crisscross pattern about 1cm apart. Brush with a little of the oil and season with salt and pepper. Place in a roasting pan and bake for 1 hour or until nearly tender.
Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in a frying pan and cook onion and garlic for 6 minutes or until soft. Cool.
Combine onion mixture, breadcrumbs, walnut, sage, mustard and 3/4 cup cheese in a bowl. Mix well.
Fill hollows of both pumpkin halves with mixture. Sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake for a further 15 minutes or until golden and pumpkin is tender. Garnish with extra sage leaves.
